scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@lexiflow/shared-types && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=@lexiflow/shared-types
